names.bio: Lisa Burns was born in 1968. She is an actress, known for The Shining (1980), From Borehamwood to Hollywood: The Rise and Fall and Rise of Elstree (2014) and VH-1 Where Are They Now? (1999).
names.name: Lisa Burns

filmography.title: From Borehamwood to Hollywood: The Rise and Fall and Rise of Elstree
